thread.title: Chris Porter scores for Flyers after being waived

title: Chris Porter scores for Flyers after being waived
text:
Published By: Philly Flyers - Yesterday 
The team is hoping the forward, who had a solid camp, clears waivers so he can be sent to the Lehigh Valley Phantoms....
